name: Web of Debt
description:
Web of Debt was made for the Northeastern University Game Dev Club's October 2013 48 hour game jam. It is a Java-based LAN co-op platformer (the game cannot be completed with only one player) where players must journey through a destroyed world in order to save President Obama and bring the government back online...before it is too late.

The game jam's themes were:

Government Shutdown

Phobias

Worlds Colliding

Puns

Mounts

Duncan (an NUGDC officer)

Controls:

Arrows: Movement

Z: Jump

X: Punch

Controls:

To connect to another player, simply allow Java access through your firewall (you'll be prompted), and open the game on another computer on the same network. Some public Wi-Fi networks will block this automatically, but Ad-hoc networking works.

Credits:

Brett Davis - Developer

Patrick Gallagher - Character Design, Animation & Music

Noah Senzel - Game Design & Sound

Christopher Young - Environment Art
